title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Declines 2% as Nearly All Assets Trade Lower
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Aave (AAVE) fell 4.7% and Ripple (XRP) dropped 4%, leading the index lower from Tuesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2733.26, down 2.0% (-57.08) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

One of 20 assets is trading higher.

Leaders: POL (+0.2%) and BTC (-0.6%).

Laggards: AAVE (-4.7%) and XRP (-4.0%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index declined 2% with nearly all assets trading lower, led by significant drops in AAVE (-4.7%) and XRP (-4.0%).
